data.title: The 7 Best Places to Live in Germany for English Speakers
data.meta_description: Ready to make yourself home in Germany? Here are the top 7 places for English-speakers to stay in Deutschland.

Finally, Munich is a great city for those who love to get outdoors. Surrounded by the Bavarian Alps and beautiful lakes, it offers nature enthusiasts ample opportunities to escape the city.
